mapper.insert: INSERT INTO debate(debate_no, debate_writer, debate_topic, debate_content, debate_time, debate_startdate) VALUES (DEB_SEQ.nextval, ${debate_writer.member_no}, '${debate_topic}', '${debate_content}', ${debate_time}, TO_DATE('${debate_startDate}','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
INSERT INTO DEBATEDETAIL (detail_no, DETAIL_DEB , DISCUSS) VALUES (DD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, ${debate_no}, '${discuss}')
mapper.select: SELECT DEB_SEQ.CURRVAL AS debate FROM DUAL
SELECT RNUM FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM debate ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM debate deb JOIN Member mem ON(deb.DEBATE_WRITER = mem.member_no) WHERE debate_topic like '%${word}%' OR debate_content like '%${word}%' ORDER BY deb.DEBATE_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, debate.* FROM debate ORDER BY DEBATE_NO DESC) deb JOIN Member mem ON(deb.DEBATE_WRITER = mem.member_no) WHERE DEBATE_NO = #{no}
